item.title: Virgilio Program 2025/26: Ranking list
item.description: The Selection Committee for the Virgilio Program 2025-26 gathered on May 15th 2025 at 12.30 am to screen applications and select applicants. item.title: Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
